bill_title: to regulate guided hunting activity on certain public waters and lands.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to regulate guided hunting activity on certain public waters and lands. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may guide any hunting activity on public waters within the state, on lands owned, leased, controlled, managed, or otherwise acquired or obtained by the state for wildlife management, public hunting, or recreation purposes, or on highways or other public rights-of- way within this state that otherwise meet the requirements of § 41-9-1.3. A violation of this section is a Class 1 misdemeanor. Section 2. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person who holds himself or herself out to the public as a hunting guide and who provides, for remuneration, transportation, equipment, arrangement of lodging, or services for the assistance of any person to locate, pursue, or hunt any wild animal is engaged in the practice of guiding a hunting activity within the purposes of this Act.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
